titles.title: Humanoid ROBOT Act of 2025
Humanoid ROBOT Act of 2025
Humanoid Robotics Oversight and Blocking of Obtainment from Totalitarians Act of 2025
A bill to reduce the risk to the national security of the United States posed by humanoid robots produced in certain countries, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
